items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Gift Nifty signals positive start for Sensex, Nifty; Asian markets mixed
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Markets in India were likely to open with a positive bias, as indicated by GIFT Nifty futures that were trading around 100 points ahead of Nifty futures last close.

items.title: Weak auto sales, rising costs may hit ancillary cos in near-term: Analysts
items.description: Experts tracking the auto and ancillary space reckon that declining wholesale auto sales carry significant concerns for auto ancillary companies in the near-term

items.title: Stocks to Watch: RIL, GIC Re, Suzlon Energy, HDFC Bank, Mastek, Adani Ent
items.description: Stocks to Watch: Reliance Industries has secured the full 10-GWh capacity of the Advanced Chemistry Cell (ACC) under the second phase of the Production Linked Incentive (PLI) scheme.

items.title: Nifty IT faces resistance at 43,200; should you book profits on rise?
items.description: The Nifty IT Index is currently displaying signs of nearing a critical resistance level. The immediate resistance level to watch is 43,200

items.title: Biocon, PFC, Chambal Fert; top picks by Ajit Mishra of Religare Broking
items.description: The pharma sector is showing notable resilience, with Biocon taking the lead. The stock has broken out from a bullish rectangle pattern, accompanied by a strong surge in volumes

items.title: Share market today: Mixed global cues, falling crude & RLL listing in focus
items.description: Share market today: Mixed Asian markets, RIL getting PLI approval for full 10 GWh battery making facility, crude oil falling 1% below $74, and Raymond Lifestyle IPO, are among triggers that will be on

items.title: Dividend, Stock Split, Buyback: Gulf Oil, 15 more shares turn ex-date today
items.description: Companies declare the beneficiaries of dividends, bonus shares, or buyback offers based on the list of investors recorded by the end of record date. Here is the list of stocks to trade ex-date today

items.title: Suzlon Energy sells corporate office to OE Business Park; stock gains 3%
items.description: The uptick in Suzlon Energy share price came after the company announced that it has executed a Conveyance Deed to sell its Pune-based corporate office to OE Business Park for Rs 440 crore.

items.title: F&O Insights: Experts advocate some caution; 4 stocks in F&O ban
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 05: The Put-Call Ratio dropped from 0.96 to 0.82, reinforcing the dominance of call writers and a cautionary trend; 25,150 remains a key level for the Nifty, says Dh

items.title: Linde gains 6% on buying Tata Steel's industrial gas assets in Kalinganagar
items.description: Linde India share price rose after the company announced that it has entered into the Plant Sale agreement with Tata Steel Limited for acquiring their Kalinganagar industrial gas supply assets.

items.title: ADIA-backed NIIF to seek $4 bn for infrastructure in largest-ever fundraise
items.description: The National Investment & Infrastructure Fund, backed by the Indian government and several global investors, is looking to raise money early next year

items.title: PNB Housing share price gains 5% on plans to raise Rs 2,500-crore via NCDs
items.description: The uptick in share price came after the company announced that its board of directors will meet on September 9, to consider and approve issuance of NCDs up to Rs 2,500 crore.

items.title: Shree Tirupati Balajee IPO opens today; GMP zooms 30%; Should you bid?
items.description: The public issue of Shree Tirupati Balajee is available at a price band of Rs 78-83 per share, with a lot size of 180 shares
